title: geth how to open persistence
body:
I set up private ETH in my own environment, but after killing the process, the relevant data does not exist. What should I do。I have tried to execute the geth removedb command and restart creation, restart GEth, still cannot persist the data
Please help me. Thank you so much

1. create genesis.json file 
```json
{
  "config": {
    "chainId": 15,
    "homesteadBlock": 0,
    "eip150Block": 0,
    "eip155Block": 0,
    "eip158Block": 0,
    "byzantiumBlock": 0,
    "constantinopleBlock": 0,
    "petersburgBlock": 0,
    "ethash": {}
  },
  "difficulty": "1",
  "gasLimit": "8000000",
  "alloc": {
    "7df9a875a174b3bc565e6424a0050ebc1b2d1d82": { "balance": "300000" },
    "f41c74c9ae680c1aa78f42e5647a62f353b7bdde": { "balance": "400000" }
  }
}

```
2.  run `geth --datadir data init genesis.json`
```
INFO [07-30|11:08:54.116] Maximum peer count                       ETH=50 LES=0 total=50
INFO [07-30|11:08:54.118] Smartcard socket not found, disabling    err="stat /run/pcscd/pcscd.comm: no such file or directory"

INFO [07-30|11:08:54.147] Opened ancient database                  database=/root/eth/dev/data/geth/chaindata/ancient readonly=false
INFO [07-30|11:08:54.147] Writing custom genesis block 
INFO [07-30|11:08:54.147] Persisted trie from memory database      nodes=3 size=397.00B time="63.178µs" gcnodes=0 gcsize=0.00B gctime=0s livenodes=1 livesize=0.00B
INFO [07-30|11:08:54.148] Successfully wrote genesis state         database=chaindata                         hash=c3638c..f97051
INFO [07-30|11:08:54.148] Allocated cache and file handles         database=/root/eth/dev/data/geth/lightchaindata cache=16.00MiB handles=16
INFO [07-30|11:08:54.167] Opened ancient database                  database=/root/eth/dev/data/geth/lightchaindata/ancient readonly=false
INFO [07-30|11:08:54.167] Writing custom genesis block 
INFO [07-30|11:08:54.168] Persisted trie from memory database      nodes=3 size=397.00B time="42.033µs" gcnodes=0 gcsize=0.00B gctime=0s livenodes=1 livesize=0.00B
INFO [07-30|11:08:54.168] Successfully wrote genesis state         database=lightchaindata                         hash=c3638c..f97051

```

3. run `geth --datadir data --networkid 15 --http --http.api personal,eth,net,miner,web3 --http.addr 0.0.0.0 --allow-insecure-unlock --rpc.allow-unprotected-txs console` 

```
> personal.newAccount("123")
> miner.start(10)
> eth.getBalance(eth.accounts[0])
42000000000000000000
> exit
```
4. Exit and restart 
```
> eth.getBalance(eth.accounts[0])
42000000000000000000

```
5. run with nohup `nohup geth --datadir data --networkid 15 --http --http.api personal,eth,net,miner,web3 --http.addr 0.0.0.0 --allow-insecure-unlock --rpc.allow-unprotected-txs     &` 
6. `cd data `
7. `geth attach ipc:geth.ipc`
```
> eth.getBalance(eth.accounts[0])
42000000000000000000

```
8. kill geth 

```
ps -ef | grep geth 
root     14131 13983  2 11:12 pts/0    00:00:01 geth --datadir data --networkid 15 --http --http.api personal,eth,net,miner,web3 --http.addr 0.0.0.0 --allow-insecure-unlock --rpc.allow-unprotected-txs
kill -9 14131 
```
9.  restart `nohup geth --datadir data --networkid 15 --http --http.api personal,eth,net,miner,web3 --http.addr 0.0.0.0 --allow-insecure-unlock --rpc.allow-unprotected-txs     &` 
10. `cd data `
11. `geth attach ipc:geth.ipc`
```
> eth.getBalance(eth.accounts[0])
42000000000000000000

```

It's possible that after step 10 the data is zero

You need to shut down Geth gracefully. Most of the state is kept in memory, if you just murder Geth, all that in-memory stuff is gone. Don't ever use `-9`. Use SIGINT or SIGTERM (unsure which one, possibly both work).
